Package ru.nsu.mbogdanov2

Class BookFit

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.mbogdanov2.BookFit
public class BookFit extends Object
Main class that realize FIT credit book. It has a lot of basic functions: add student, add marks, check different information about student knowledge

    • checkScholarship

      public boolean checkScholarship(String name)
      Checking of students scholarship. If student doesn't have bad marks in his credit book Then he has scholarship

      Returns:
      true if student has scholarship or false

    • checkRedDiploma

      public boolean checkRedDiploma(String name)
      Checking of students red diploma. If student has only Хорошо or Отлично marks and Отлично mark for Квалификационную работу Then he has red diploma
      Parameters:
      name - name of the student
      Returns:
      true if student has red diploma or false

    • checkHighScholarship

      public boolean checkHighScholarship(String name)
      Checking of high scholarship. If student has only Отлично marks in his credit book Then he has high scholarship
      Parameters:
      name - string student name
      Returns:
      true if student has high scholarship or false in another way
